Hero.name: Omer
Hero.description: Explore my journey on GitHub and the digital world I've built.

About.title: About Me
About.description: Hello! I'm Omer. I love building user-oriented, performant, and aesthetic digital experiences with modern web technologies. I am a person who constantly learns and does not hesitate to try new technologies. Currently, I am mainly in the Next.js and TypeScript ecosystem.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: My main goal is not just to write code, but to solve a problem in the most elegant and efficient way. In the future, I want to take part in the architecture of large-scale systems.

ProjectsCard.noDescription: No description provided for this project, but it's definitely a great job!

Contact.title: LET'S MEET!
Contact.description: You can always write to me for new projects, collaborations, or just to say hello.
